name: Aim Endlessly
description:
Aim Endlessly is an aim trainer that helps you to take your mouse control, reflexes and general aim skill to the next level.

The purpose of the game is to hit as many objects as possible while you keep moving forward at an increasing speed, otherwise you will lose.

Your score will be saved once you lose.

It has 2 game modes: Challenge and Practice

  • The Challenge mode is an endless run divided into phases and if you miss too many times you will lose.
  • The Practice mode allow you to change couple parameters of the game, you can't lose the game,  making it basically endless.

Commands:

  • Tab : for settings (sensitivity multiplier, crosshair style) IN GAME ONLY
